data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gültekin, Levent (2008): Taxonomic review of the stem-inhabiting trehala-constructing Larinus Dejean, 1821 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae): New species, systematics and ecology. Zootaxa 1714: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274123
